mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM physical_examination_record per LEFT JOIN custom_info ci ON per.custom_id = ci.id LEFT JOIN ly_organization lo ON lo.id = per.organization_id WHERE 1=1
AND ci.name = '${name}'
AND ci.mobile = '${mobile}'
AND per.check_time >= '${check_time_start}'
AND per.check_time <= '${check_time_end}'
ORDER BY ${orderby}

SELECT per.id, per.organization_id, per.check_time, ci.name, ci.sex, ci.birthday, ci.body_height, ci.weight FROM physical_examination_record per LEFT JOIN custom_info ci ON per.custom_id = ci.id WHERE per.id = ${id}
